articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Nigerian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, president of Nigeria, as regards an explosion that occurred on the suburbs of Abuja, Nigeria, claiming huge casualties.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the Nigerian president, government, people and bereaved families of the victims and wished the Nigerian government and people success in their work to ensure stability of the country under the leadership of the president.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets French PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets French PM
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Manuel Valls upon his appointment as prime minister of France on April 7.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his future responsible work.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Denounces S. Korean Intelligence Service's Results of Investigation into Spy Case
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Denounces S. Korean Intelligence Service's Results of Investigation into Spy Case
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) made public information bulletin No. 1059 Wednesday in connection with the fact that the south Korean puppet prosecution made public the final results of investigation into the spy case of a public official in Seoul city.
					 The information bulletin said:
					
					 The spy case is another vivid proof of the despicable nature of the Intelligence Service and the crimes it has committed by unhesitatingly hatching any base plot to gratify its political greed and escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 Park Geun Hye sheltered and protected Nam Jae Jun, the chief architect of the case, to give a shot in his arm. This proves that Park is the same accomplice as Nam.
					
					 Nam, a remnant of "yusin", is an old military gangster who should have been eliminated long ago due to the public censure.
					
					 Park, however, is keen to use the guy, dregs of history and ultra-right fascist confrontation maniac, for the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship and the anti-DPRK smear campaign. It is, therefore, as clear as noonday that south Korea is bound to turn into a dark land where fascism and tyranny get rampant and the north-south relations are to be pushed to more serious catastrophe.
					
					 Park orchestrated such a deceptive farce as making an "apology," prompted by her intention to use Nam, her closest confidant, as the last prop for maintaining her power, tide over ruling crisis, ward off the negative impact the recent case will have on the upcoming elections to local self-governing bodies, keep the IS and "reform" it in a more fascist way.
					
					 This is a revelation of the sinister intention to use the IS, a den of conspiracies and plot-breeding, for stoking confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is impossible to check the revival of the tyrannical policy in south Korea and put under control the catastrophe of the north-south relations as long as Nam is allowed to go scot-free, the information bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life should turn out more courageously in the struggle to have the IS disbanded and ostracize Nam.
					
					 Park is sadly mistaken if she thinks she can weather her ruling crisis and ensure the stability of her rule in reliance on such fascist confrontation maniacs.
					
					 Park should behave with discretion, clearly understanding that she will meet the same fate as Nam's if she continues harboring him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from General Secretary of C.C, Lao People's Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from General Secretary of C.C, Lao People's Revolutionary Party
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on April 11.
					 The message said:
					
					 Dear Comrade,
					
					 I send to you warm congratulations and best wishes on behalf of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the Central Committee of Defence and Security and me on your reelection as the first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the First Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK.
					
					 Your recent reelection to the top post of the DPRK is the manifestation of the absolute trust of the party and government of the DPRK and all Korean people in you.
					
					 I express firm belief that the fraternal Korean people will register big successes in their struggle for attaining the goals set by the First Session of the 13th SPA of the DPRK and building a thriving socialist nation under your wise leadership.
					
					 I also wish you good health, happiness and success in your noble cause.
					
					 I hope that the traditional friendly relations between parties, states and peoples of Laos and the DPRK will steadily grow stronger.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception to Mark Day of Sun 
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the Cuban embassy here on Thursday to mark the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung). 
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned. 
					
					 A staff member of the Cuban embassy was present at the reception. 
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said in a speech made at the reception that they significantly celebrated together with the Korean people the 102nd birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The great life of Kim Il Sung was an example for the Korean people and the world revolutionary people, he said.
					
					 The Cuban people will always remain friends of the Korean people, he noted, expressing belief that the Korean people would build a thriving socialist nation at an early date and achieve national reunification at any cost. 
					
					 Speaking next, Yang Hyong Sop said that every year Cuban comrades joined the Korean people in significantly celebrating the Day of the Sun, adding that this was an expression of boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the DPRK government to value and steadily develop the militant friendship and solidarity with Cuba associated with the noble exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he noted, stressing that the Korean people would as ever stand in the same trench with the fraternal Cuban people in the common struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism.

articles.title: Group or Separate Performances of Art Festival Given
articles.content:
Group or Separate Performances of Art Festival Given
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Group or separate performances of the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival were given before full houses at theatres in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
					 Foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes put on stages songs such as "O, the Care of the Leader", "Ode to Comrade Kim Jong Il" and "General on a Galloping White Horse". They sang high praises of the revolutionary lives and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The performers also put on stages hymns praising the personality of supreme leader Kim Jong Un as a great man and songs reflecting the ideological and mental world of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who will firmly trust in only him and remain loyal to his leadership.
					
					 The artistes represented with rich voices, veteran playing and good ensemble the desire and noble mental world of the people to live in happiness, enjoying an independent and creative life to their heart's content in the world free from aggression, war and subordination in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 Also put on stages were colorful numbers such as songs, dances and instrumental music reflecting the love of the peoples of various countries for the country and their optimistic character and traditional life custom.
					
					 Acrobats put on stages various acrobatics full of inexhaustible creative power and wisdom, bravery, optimism and vim.

articles.title: Joint Friendship Gathering with Participants in Art Festival Held
articles.content:
Joint Friendship Gathering with Participants in Art Festival Held
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A joint friendship gathering with the participants in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was held at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Thursday.
					 Present there were members of the festival organizing committee, officials concerned, foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The participants talked to one another that they significantly adorned the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) with colorful and peculiar numbers of their performances, expressing ardent reverence for Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who are always alive as the sun of mankind and Marshal Kim Jong Un and underscored the need to boost exchanges and cooperation in the idea of independence, peace and friendship in the future, too.
					
					 They sang and danced, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Closes
articles.content:
29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Closes 
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival which opened with splendor on April 11 closed with due ceremony in the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday. 
					 The participants in the festival displayed high artistry in their numbers sincerely prepared with ardent reverence for the great man, making contributions to boosting the cultural cooperation among countries and developing culture and arts. 
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned and citizens. 
					
					 Also attending the ceremony were foreign artistes, overseas Korean artistes, foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies, military attaches and embassy officials here, foreign guests and overseas Koreans. 
					
					 There took place a prize-awarding ceremony. 
					
					 Group prizes went to the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior, the Eastern Song and Dance Ensemble of China, the Song and Dance Ensemble of Mongolian Army, art troupe of Koreans in Japan and art troupe of Koreans in China and prize of merits, prize of creation, individual prize and prize of ensemble went to many artistes and numbers. 
					
					 Diplomas and gold and silver statuettes according to the festival prizes were awarded to them. 
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un from the participants in the festival was adopted. 
					
					 Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture who is vice-chairman of the Festival Organizing Committee, made a closing address. He said through the festival its participants prayed for the immortality of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and voiced firm support and solidarity with the Korean people in their drive for making a leap forward in building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He expressed belief that they would participate in the festival with sincerity in the future, too, cherishing the noble idea of the festival and friendship among artistes.
					
					 The flag of the festival was lowered amid the playing of the Korean song "Ode to the Motherland". 
					
					 Performances were given by foreign artistes who deeply impressed the audiences during the festival.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Art Festival
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a letter from the participants in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival on Thursday.
					 The letter extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his reelection as first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK at the 1st Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK by the unanimous will and desire of all the Korean people.
					
					 The festival once again strikingly demonstrated its noble ideal, good tradition and great advantages and vitality by greatly contributing to further consolidating the friendship and solidarity, exchanges and cooperation among artistes of various countries of the world, it said and continued:
					
					 During the festival we most significantly celebrated the Day of the Sun when President Kim Il Sung was born together with the Korean people and witnessed the bright appearance of the Korean people who sincerely love justice and peace, filled with the conviction of certain victory of their cause and optimism.
					
					 We have seen for ourselves with admiration the great achievements made in building a thriving nation and in the fields of culture and arts in recent years under your leadership and the sky-high spirit of the DPRK making a leap forward with dynamism.
					
					 We are very pleased that the festival was held with success and we spent more pleasant and meaningful days thanks to the sincere efforts of the close Korean people and the festival organizing committee.
					
					 The letter extended sincere thanks to Kim Jong Un for showing meticulous care and paying deep attention so that the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was held with splendor though he was very busy with state affairs.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un, Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the hearts of all of us and the art festival will steadily develop into a grand international art festival along with the century, it concluded.

articles.title: Russian Academy Ensemble Wins Popularity at April Art Festival
articles.content:
Russian Academy Ensemble Wins Popularity at April Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior has given performances at the Ponghwa Art Theatre as part of the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival held here.
					 Viktor Yeliseev, head and chief conductor of the ensemble, visited Pyongyang for the first time in Juche 74 (1985) and had the honor to give performance in the presence of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 From 2001, the ensemble has given performances in Pyongyang nearly every year or twice a year.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il enjoyed the performance of the ensemble on several occasions, highly appreciating its performance.
					
					 In the current festival, it has put on the stage a male solo "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and a chorus and orchestra "Song of General Kim Jong Il", evoking stormy cheers among the audience.
					
					 Merited Artiste Nataliya Yeliseeva, wife of the head of the ensemble, sang the Korean song "Ardent Desire" in representation of her wish for the good health of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance was vibrant with feelings of the DPRK-Russia friendship.

articles.title: Belarus Artiste Highly Applauded at Art Festival
articles.content:
Belarus Artiste Highly Applauded at Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Among foreign art troupes attending the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was the Belarus National Dancing Company.
					 The company put on the stage dances representing the old life of the Belarus people. 
					
					 Its performance drew a storm of applause with the Korean song "Song of General Kim Il Sung", an immortal revolutionary hymn, sung by the female soloist, Valentina Olshanskaya.
					
					 Olshanskaya told KCNA:
					
					 Each nation has its favorite songs. 
					
					 Before coming to Pyongyang, officials of my company suggested that I sing the "Song of General Kim Il Sung", which the DPRK people love so much.
					
					 I came to be well aware of the idea of the song through its melodies.
					
					 It is the first time for me to visit Pyongyang. 
					
					 My fellow artistes who visited Pyongyang nine years ago said they were surprised to see Pyongyang, which had undergone remarkable changes.
					
					 I want to continue attending the festival in the future, too.

articles.title: Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Staff Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Venue of Kimilsungia Festival
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and its members Thursday visited the venue of the 16th Kimilsungia Festival. 
					 They looked round the festival venue which has turned into a veritable sea of flowers, representing boundless reverence and praises of all people for President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 At the end of the visit Jo Il Min said:
					
					 The Kimilsungia festival praising the great man is being held with splendor every year. 
					
					 All the flowers represent the profound reverence of all peoples for the President. 
					
					 The visit to the festival venue offered an opportunity to more keenly realize how ardently all Koreans and progressive people in the world venerate him. 
					
					 The great august name of the President and image of the sun will shine forever together with the immortal flower Kimilsungia.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message, Gift and Medal to Kim Jong Un from Russian Organization
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message, Gift and Medal to Kim Jong Un from Russian Organization
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message, gift and medal from the National Federation of Associations of Reserve Officers of Russia on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were conveyed to Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, on April 8 by Alekseyev Alexandr Anatoliyevich, first vice-chairman of the federation.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The visiting delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The guests went round historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae before visiting revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 Garib Newaz, chairman of the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Center, said that whenever he visited Mangyongdae, he recollected with deep emotion the revolutionary life of Kim Il Sung, adding that Kim Il Sung, who was born in a simple family and grew up to be a great revolutionary, is the eternal leader of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 Meanwhile, the guests visited the venue of the 16th Kimilsungia Festival, Okryu Children's Hospital, People's Open-air Ice Rink, Skate Park, etc.

articles.title: Delegation of Workers' Party of Mexico Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Workers' Party of Mexico Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico headed by National Leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, left here for home on Thursday after visiting the DPRK on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Phophyong Revolutionary Museum Marks Its Golden Jubilee
articles.content:
Phophyong Revolutionary Museum Marks Its Golden Jubilee
 Hyesan, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Phophyong Revolutionary Museum marked its 50th anniversary. It is situated in Kim Hyong Jik County, Ryanggang Province.
					 Over the past 50 years since its founding on April 15, Juche 53 (1964), the museum has successfully performed its duty of educating the visitors in the revolutionary tradition of Juche, recording its proud history under the wise guidance and meticulous care of the party and the leader.
					
					 It has done in a responsible manner its work to preserve and manage the historic buildings and revolutionary relics associated with the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and feats performed by the family members in Mangyongdae on the principle of historicism and to restore them to their former glory.
					
					 There took place a meeting on Thursday to mark the 50th anniversary of the museum.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned and officials and employees of the museum.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea to the officials and employees of the museum was conveyed at the meeting.
					
					 The message highly praised the officials and employees of the museum for having devotedly worked to creditably perform the honorable duty for resolutely defending and widely explaining the revolutionary tradition of Juche with white gem-like loyalty to the party and the leader.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Provocative Max Thunder War Drill
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Provocative Max Thunder War Drill
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers kicked off Max Thunder, a large-scale combined air battle drill, in south Korea on April 11.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a commentary.
					
					 It brands the above-said drill as a grave military provocation escalating the tension and the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula as it is a clear manifestation of their ever-more disgusted intention to mount a preemptive strike at the DPRK.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and south Korean authorities who are engrossed in military provocation while stocking the danger of war on the peninsula, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Their fiction about the "infiltration of drones by the north" is a mean plot to lead the north-south relations to the eve of a war once again by fabricating the second "Cheonan" warship sinking case.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' talk about the "threats from the north's nuclear test" and "infiltration of drones by the north" is nothing but a pretext to round off the preparations for a war by staging intensive joint military drills and spark off a nuclear war on the peninsula at any cost.
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to take measures for self-defense under the prevailing grave situation including the measure of bolstering the nuclear deterrent to foil the hostile forces' military challenge to it.
					
					 The U.S. and puppet warmongers should behave with discretion if they do not want to face merciless punishment by the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Refrain from Slandering DPRK: News Analysis
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Refrain from Slandering DPRK: News Analysis
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities have persistently resorted to slandering the DPRK.
					 Some days ago, Park Geun Hye, the top south Korean decision-maker, at a meeting of senior secretaries of Chongwadae talked about "the north's breach of the promise to stop slandering and provoking each other" and "internal unrest" in the north.
					
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean puppet regime claimed that it did not slander the north but the latter abused its "president" by directly naming her.
					
					 This is the height of folly reminding one of a thief crying "Stop thief!"
					
					 It is none other than the Park group that reneged on the agreement on halting slanders between the north and the south.
					
					 In the historic New Year Address, the DPRK called for putting an end to making slanders in order to open up a new phase of the nation's independent and peaceful reunification. And the DPRK National Defence Commission advanced a crucial proposal for its implementation.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean puppet group totally rejected the call and proposal, terming them "wordplay".
					
					 In February, the north and the south opened high-level contacts in which they made an agreement on stopping slandering each other.
					
					 True to the agreement, the DPRK had refrained from doing all acts considered by the south Korean authorities to be slanders.
					
					 Moreover, it took a series of measures conducive to detente and brought to success the reunion of separated families and their relatives even at a time when the DPRK-targeted joint military drills were at hand in south Korea.
					
					 But the south Korean chief executive during her overseas tour dared slander the DPRK over its strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as well as its social system, while taking issue with "the north's nuclear threat".
					
					 In the meantime, the puppet military and ministries of Foreign Affairs and Unification have been hell-bent on anti-DPRK psychological campaign and abuses of "human rights situation" in the DPRK, arguing that "the military's north-targeted psychological warfare and the north's human rights issue have nothing to do with the suspension of slanders."
					
					 Now the puppet authorities are openly making slanders against the DPRK, while south Korean media are echoing their remarks and the defectors to the south are running amuck in scattering anti-DPRK leaflets.
					
					 Ceaseless slanders have brought the north-south relations to collapse.
					
					 The puppet group's slanders will only lead to its shameful destruction.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on Tuesday, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The letter said:
					
					 April 15, the birth anniversary of the President, is the day of the great fortune of the nation in which the sun of Juche rose up for the first time in the nation's history spanning five thousand years and the day of an epoch-making event in which the dawn of the era of independence broke on the road ahead of progressive humankind.
					
					 The President brought the bright dawn of Korea's liberation to Koreans in China once lived with the bitter tears of a stateless nation in an alien land, and put forward the Juche-oriented idea and line on the movement of the overseas Koreans, leading them to fulfill their national duties on the road of patriotism for the building of a strong and prosperous country, national reunification and national great unity.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il took warm care of the Koreans in China with the paternal love, always remembering them in the whole course of his revolutionary activities for purely carrying forward and developing the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the Koreans in China are living with the great pride of being the Korean nation without the slightest loneliness and sorrow in an alien land.
					
					 The officials of the General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China will devote themselves to the patriotic work for reunifying the country and building a strong and prosperous country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Russia was held by the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia on April 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Present there were An Hyang Jin, vice-chairperson of the confederation, and other Koreans in Russia.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos dealing with the revolutionary life of the President.
					
					 Also on display were photos and publications showing the development of the homeland.
					
					 The participants in the meeting laid bouquets before the full-length picture of Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made there and those who visited the homeland gave their impressions of it.
					
					 Speakers said April 15 is the significant day when the new era opened in the history of the Korean people, adding there is Korea today thanks to this day.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a socialist country centred on the popular masses and a full-fledged independent state which launched satellites and had access to nuclear deterrence despite the harsh blockade of the imperialists, they noted.
					
					 Those visitors to the homeland said that they pictured to themselves a bright future of the country, while seeing for themselves the great changes brought about by Marshal Kim Jong Un for the happiness of the people as successor to the cause of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They expressed their will to positively turn out in the struggle to bring earlier the day of national reunification true to the behests of the Generalissimos.

articles.title: Korean National Art Festival in Uzbekistan Celebrates Day of Sun
articles.content:
Korean National Art Festival in Uzbekistan Celebrates Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The 21st Korean National Art Festival was held in Tashkent by Koreans in Uzbekistan on April 13 in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun). 
					 Present at the festival were officials of Korean organizations in Uzbekistan and members of 17 Koreans' art troupes. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK charge d'affaires ad interim to Uzbekistan and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Tashkent. 
					
					 Ju Yong Il, chairman of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, said in his opening ceremony that it was a tradition for Koreans in Uzbekistan to hold the art festival every year on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung is deeply revered by the world progressives for the immortal exploits he performed for the liberation of Korea, building of socialism and the cause of national reunification and global independence, and for his noble popular traits. 
					
					 The art festival is more significant as it is taking place at a time when Marshal Kim Jong Un was reelected as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					
					 Witnessing the reality of the DPRK in which it is taking on the looks of a highly civilized socialist nation as the days go by under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, we foresee the morrow of the country and a bright day when the country will be reunified. 
					
					 We Koreans in Uzbekistan will intensify the patriotic work for national reunification, keeping pace with the people in the motherland, though we are far away from it. 
					
					 Put on the stage of the festival were choruses of the immortal revolutionary hymns "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il", "Korea Does What It Is Determined to Do" and "We Are One", dances "Dance with Fans" and "Dance with Janggu" and other colorful numbers.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Brazil
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was published in pamphlet by the Asa Copias Publishing House of Brazil on April 10.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively indicates the ways of achieving the great national unity including the issues of founding a unified state through the unity of the whole nation and getting united on the basis of patriotism and the spirit of national independence, issues of promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests, putting an end to all political disputes that foment division and confrontation between fellow countrymen and trusting each other between the north and the south  and achieving unity and matters of joining hands on the road of national reunification, without rejecting each other because of differing isms.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Panama
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Panama
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was published in pamphlet by the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Panama on April 10.
					 The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetimes. It also indicates tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Shows Held in Indonesia and Guinea
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Shows Held in Indonesia and Guinea
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungia shows took place with due ceremonies in Indonesia and Guinea on April 8 and 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 On display at their venues were photos dealing with the exploits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The venues full of Kimilsungias, immortal flower, in full bloom presented fantastic scenery.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremonies were figures of political parties, governments, organizations, organizations for the study of the Juche idea and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and masses in those countries.
					
					 Nurdin Purnomo, chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, said that the show would offer an important occasion in helping Indonesians know better about the personality of Kim Il Sung as a great man and socialist Korea and further boosting the friendship between the two countries.
					
					 Mamadou Saidou Bah, vice-chairman of the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association, noted that the Day of the Sun is a common holiday of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 Kimilsungia is the flower praising a great man as it represents all peoples' respect and reverence for Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kimilsungia is a common treasure of humankind as it is a famous flower recognized by the world.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche started by Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il is now being carried to completion by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever achieve greater successes in their drive for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Exploits of Peerlessly Great Persons Highly Praised
articles.content:
Exploits of Peerlessly Great Persons Highly Praised
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by the P.T. Dwi Mitra Perkasa Company and Sofian Machine Engineering Company in Indonesia, University of Abuja of Nigeria and Lerida City, Spain on April 4 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) and the 21st anniversary of the election of leader Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Present there were figures of various circles and masses in the relevant countries.
					
					 The manager of the P.T. Dwi Mitra Perkasa Company of Indonesia recalled that Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of the revolution at his young age, achieved the historical cause of national liberation by leading the anti-Japanese war against the Japanese imperialists to victory and turned the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The manager of the Sofian Machine Engineering Company noted:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a great man recognized by the world.
					
					 He defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialisms and made the DPRK stand imposingly on the international arena.
					
					 The Korean People's Army has demonstrated its might as a powerful army capable of beating any formidable enemy in the world. This would be unthinkable without the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy said that Kim Jong Il who was elected chairman of the NDC of the DPRK not only consolidated it as a political and military power which no force dared provoke but also ushered in a new era of building a thriving nation despite the worst adversity and trials in history under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The chairman of the Spanish preparatory committee for celebrating Day of the Sun explained and proved the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is bringing the dreams and ideals of the people to realities true to the intentions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Russian and Iranian newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, on April 8 and 9.
					 They each allotted one whole page to articles illustrated with portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photos of the old home in Mangyongdae and Kimilsungia.
					
					 The Russian newspaper Vladivostok in its article titled "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the eternal guiding idea of Korean revolution" stressed that Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the only guiding idea for achieving the victory in the popular masses' cause of independence and cause of socialism.
					
					 The Russian newspaper Rio Panorama in its article titled "Immortal exploits performed for building an independent and sovereign state" praised Kim Il Sung for founding the DPRK, the country of the people, the first of its kind in history.
					
					 The Iranian newspaper The Iran News carried an article titled "Eternal sun". It said:
					
					 Although Kim Il Sung passed away, his idea and exploits will shine forever as the sun always remains brilliant.
					
					 The Korean people made sure that Kim Il Sung lies in state in the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					
					 The president is being presented with orders, medals, honorary titles and gifts by a lot of heads of state, prominent figures and international bodies.
					
					 Events are taking place to celebrate Day of the Sun.
					
					 Kim Il Sung will always be alive in the hearts of humankind as the sun of Juche.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Russia, Bulgaria and Finland on April 7 and 10 to celebrate the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 Seen on the front walls of the venues of the meetings were portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the meetings were personages of various social standings and people of those countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the great revolutionary idea brightly illuminating the road ahead of humankind and supreme leader Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the Korean people to a fresh victory while glorifying the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The acting chief of Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia, Bulgaria praised Kim Il Sung for founding the immortal Juche idea and working such historic miracles as defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialisms after embarking upon the road of revolution in his early years.
					
					 The chairman of the Finland-Korea Society said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea who built the people's country on the land of Korea.
					
					 He worked his heart and soul to reunify the divided country.
					
					 The Korean people are registering great successes in their struggle for smashing the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK, building a thriving nation and reunifying the country, true to the idea and intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, united close around Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Bulgaria and Finland

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups illustrated with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and photos dealing with exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the birth anniversary of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					 The Mongolian newspaper Khodolmor No. 14 said in an article titled "Leader of the people":
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who embarked on the road of revolution in his early years, indicated the way to be followed by the era and humankind by founding the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 He liberated Korea by defeating Japanese imperialism and built the country of the people. He successfully defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country by repulsing the aggression by the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world. He also set a world model in the struggle for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 He was the great leader of progressive mankind who positively supported the national liberation struggle of different countries and their efforts for building a new society.
					
					 The April issue of the German newspaper Rote Fahne said in an article titled "Exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in state building" that he set forth the idea and theories of building a state centered on the popular masses and turned the DPRK into a socialist power of independence, self-sufficiency and self-reliance in defence.
					
					 The solid foundation provided by him is the basic guarantee for the eternal victory of the DPRK, the paper noted.
					
					 The British paper The New Worker on March 28 in an article titled "To ensure peace is the firm will of the DPRK" introduced the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK for mending the north-south relations and preventing a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Crackdown on Chongryon Condemned by Romanian Political Party, Organization
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Crackdown on Chongryon Condemned by Romanian Political Party, Organization
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A political party and an organization of Romania sent protest letters to the Japanese prime minister on April 9 and 10.
					 The Socialist Party of Romania said:
					
					 The Japanese authorities' illegal decision on allowing the forcible sale of the Korean Hall of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) is a wanton violation of the dignity and rights of Koreans in Japan and a grave encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 We once again remind the Japanese government that the Korean Hall of Chongryon has played the role of a diplomatic mission of the DPRK for the DPRK-Japan friendship and peace in Northeast Asia in the absence of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should immediately stop their political crackdown and national persecution against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and cancel at once their decision on allowing the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Romania will positively support the Korean people's just struggle.
					
					 The Romanian Workers' Association denounced the Japanese authorities for their suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 We vividly remember the crimes committed by Japan against the Korean people from long ago.
					
					 We strongly urge Japan to stop its moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK Accused by Egyptian Political Parties
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK Accused by Egyptian Political Parties
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Political parties of Egypt issued statements on April 6 and 9 in denunciation of the U.S. reckless moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt said that the U.S. is hell-bent on the "human rights" racket and drills for a nuclear war against the DPRK while describing them as "annual ones". It went on:
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove what is the purpose pursued by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 We vehemently condemn the U.S. base hostile moves toward the DPRK.
					
					 The National Progressive Unionist Party of Egypt said:
					
					 The U.S. is intensifying the moves to politically, militarily and economically stifle the DPRK advancing along the road of independence and socialism.
					
					 The U.S. is now staging the war drills for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK by mobilizing all nuclear striking means on the Korean peninsula. It is also finding fault with the DPRK over its just rocket launching drills.
					
					 The U.S. sophism can convince nobody.
					
					 We extend full support to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to foil the U.S. moves to stifle them.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente nigeriano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente nigeriano
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 15 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de Nigeria, Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, con motivo de que ese pais africano sufrio muchas perdidas humanas por la explosion de bomba en el suburbio de Abuja.
					El remitente expresa profunda compasion y condolencias al destinatario y al gobierno y pueblo de Nigeria y a los familiares de las victimas.
					
					Desea que bajo la guia del mandatario, se logren exitos en el trabajo del gobierno y pueblo nigerianos para asegurar la estabilidad del pais.

articles.title: CRPP urge desmantelamiento de SNI y destitucion de su presidente
articles.content:
CRPP urge desmantelamiento de SNI y destitucion de su presidente
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Con respecto al resultado final de la fiscalia surcoreana sobre el caso de espia oficinista de la ciudad de Seul, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 16 la informacion no. 1059. 
					El presente caso es otro testigo que revela al interior y exterior la asquerosa naturaleza y crimenes del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia (SNI) del Sur de Corea que comete los complots de toda indole para satisfacer su ambicion politica y hacer la confrontacion fratricida, senala la nota y continua: 
					
					Park Geun-hye ampara y estimula al culpable del caso Nam Jae Jun. Esto demuestra que Park es el complice de Nam, viejo gangster militar y residuo de la dictadura de "Yusin" (renovacion) rechazado por la poblacion. 
					
					Park ampara a esta basura de la historia y maniaco fascista de enfrentamiento y lo utiliza al resurgimiento de la dictadura de "Yusin" y a la campana intrigante anti-RPDC, debido a lo cual el Sur de Corea se convertira en la sociedad oscura donde reinan el fascismo y la represion y las relaciones intercoreanas se encontraran en la crisis mas catastrofica. 
					
					La farsa enganosa de "disculpa" de Park parte del malsano intento de salvarse de la crisis de dominacion tomando a su lacayo Nam como punto de sosten del poder, impedir la influencia negativa del presente caso intrigante a las elecciones de autonomia local, mantener el SNI y "reformarlo" de modo mas fascista. 
					
					Park persigue el objetivo de seguir presentando el SNI, nido de complots, al frente del enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Mientras que existan los restos de la dictadura de "Yusin", no se puede detener el resurgimiento de la politica de represion en el Sur de Corea ni la ruptura de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea deben levantarse con dinamismo en la lucha por desmantelar el SNI, origen de la represion fascista y de la confrontacion fratricida, y enterrar a Nam Jae Jun. 
					
					Seria una ilusion vana si Park Geun-hye piensa en que podria salvar la crisis de dominacion y mantener la estabilidad de mandato basandose en los maniacos fascistas de enfrentamiento. 
					
					Park Geun-hye debe actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de que el amparo a Nam le llevara al mismo destino de ese tipejo.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por el Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por el Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio el dia 17 un banquete en su sede diplomatica. 
					Fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Hyong Jun, y otros funcionarios coreanos. 
					
					Estuvo presente el miembro de la sede diplomatica cubana. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el representante diplomatico dijo que ha celebrado significativamente junto con el pueblo coreano el 102o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente y agrego que la vida del lider coreano es el modelo para el pueblo coreano y los otros revolucionarios del mundo. 
					
					Continuo que tanto en el pasado como en el presente, el pueblo cubano quedara para siempre como amigo del pueblo coreano y expreso la conviccion de que los coreanos construiran cuanto antes un Estado prospero socialista y lograran sin falta la reintegracion territorial de la patria. 
					
					Yang Hyong Sop dijo que cada ano, los companeros cubanos celebran solemnemente junto con el pueblo coreano el Dia del Sol, lo cual es una expresion de infinita veneracion hacia el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Destaco que apreciar, consolidar y desarrollar la amistad combativa y los lazos de solidaridad con Cuba, en que estan impregnadas las proezas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, son la invariable posicion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					En el futuro tambien, al igual que en el pasado, el pueblo coreano estara siempre en la misma trinchera con el hermano pueblo cubano en la lucha comun por la independencia, el antiimperialismo y el socialismo, apunto.

articles.title: Clausurado 29o Festival Artistico de Amistad en Primavera
articles.content:
Clausurado 29o Festival Artistico de Amistad en Primavera
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado el 29o Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera, iniciado el dia 11 en esta capital. 
					Los participantes en el festival demostraron elevadas habilidades artisticas en sus programas preparados con sinceridad con el ardiente sentimiento de elogio al Presidente Kim Il Sung y contribuyeron a fortalecer la cooperacion cultural entre los paises y desarrollar la cultura y arte de la humanidad. 
					
					En la ceremonia de clausura, que tuvo lugar este jueves en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este, participaron el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop y otros funcionarios correspondientes junto con los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes los artistas extranjeros y artistas compatriotas en ultramar, los representantes diplomaticos y de las organizaciones internacionales, miembros de embajadas, acreditados en Corea, los huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo la ceremonia de premiacion. 
					
					Fueron otorgados el premio colectivo al Conjunto Artistico Academico de la Unidad del Ministerio del Interior de Rusia, el Banda de Canciones y Danzas del Oriente de China, el Conjunto Artistico del Ejercito de Mongolia, el conjunto artistico de coreanos residentes en Japon y el de coreanos residentes en China, y el premio de merito, el de creacion, el individual y el de ensamblaje a muchos artistas y piezas. 
					
					Tambien fueron otorgados los diplomas, las copas de oro y plata. 
					
					En la ocasion fue aprobada la carta al Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					El viceministro de Cultura y vicepresidente del comite organizador del festival, Han Chol pronuncio la palabra de clausura. 
					
					El dijo que a traves del presente certamen, los participantes desearon la eternidad de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y expresaron el firme apoyo y solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo coreano que registra saltos en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista bajo la guia del Mariscal. 
					
					Manifesto la conviccion de que tambien en el futuro los participantes tomaran parte en el festival apreciando el noble ideal de la cita y la amistad entre si. 
					
					Bajo la bandera del festival en medio de la interpretacion de la cancion coreana "Himno a la Patria". 
					
					Luego, se ofrecio la funcion de los artistas de varios paises que dejaron profunda impresion a los espectadores.

articles.title: Tiene lugar encuentro de amistad con participantes en 29o Festival Artistico
articles.content:
Tiene lugar encuentro de amistad con participantes en 29o Festival Artistico
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el Palacio de Taekwondo el encuentro conjunto de amistad con los participantes en el 29o Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera.
					Estuvieron presentes aqui los miembros del comite organizador del festival, los funcionarios coreanos, los artistas extranjeros y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos. 
					
					Los participantes dijeron que coronaron el Dia del Sol con las piezas artisticas preparadas con gran veneracion a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il que viven siempre como sol de la humanidad y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Conversaron sobre el mayor desarrollo de intercambio y cooperacion entre los artistas de varios paises del mundo bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad. 
					
					Ellos estrecharon los sentimientos de amistad cantando y bailando juntos.
